_sText:
Sacredplace. Bomb defuse. A map by CoCoNUT. Models by Valve, Janosch, Nauz, ProgSys, nebukadnezar. Textures by Valve, CoCoNUT, Raistlin "Round-temple"-prefab by Hamster

Background: A huge temple-area in greece is being prepared for tourists and visitors, but now some terrorists want to press money. They threaten to blow these precious artifacts up! Terrorists: Plant the bomb! Counter-Terrorists: Defeat the Terrorists.

Spawnpoints: 44, packed with Pakrat. HDR. Hand-tuned nav-file.
